subject: Olympic Games (2012)
Doping (Sports)
Track and Field
lead_paragraph: E-mails show that track-and-field officials were aware of abnormal test results for the racewalker Alex Schwazer but did not try to prevent him from competing in London, prosecutors said.
snippet: E-mails show that track-and-field officials were aware of abnormal test results for the racewalker Alex Schwazer but did not try to prevent him from competing in London, prosecutors said.
